John is with Marty inside the van. John tries to offer her comfort. Hysterically, Marty begs John to find Cole. Bo demands to know from Jared who the man is and what he had to do with him. Charlie orders vodka on the rocks from the barkeep. Marcie calls Michael and asks for his help in getting her a million dollars. John looks for Cole and finds him, lying on the rocks. She takes off her necklace and gives it to David instead. David refuses the necklace. David decides not to turn Marcie in to John and Todd. The van blows up where Marty is trapped. John and Cole watch in horror.
